see_your_notifications_right_on_your_scr: See your notifications right on your screen. Even the website is closed
choose_system_notifications_you_want_to_: Choose system notifications you want to receive as Web Push Notification
subscribe_to_receive_notifications_from_: Subscribe to receive notifications from this site
enter_the_title_of_this_push_notificatio: Enter the title of this push notification. Max 30 characters
enter_the_message_of_this_push_notificat: Enter the message of this push notification. Keep it less than 40 characters for the best layout.
choose_a_icon_for_this_push_notification: Choose a icon for this push notification. Reommend dimensions for the image are 100x100 pixels.
choose_a_photo_to_be_sent_in_this_push_n: Choose a photo to be sent in this push notification.
enter_the_url_on_which_you_want_to_redir: Enter the URL on which you want to redirect subscribers when they click on this push notification (Enter full url like: https://yourwebsite.com)
please_add_a_valid_redirect_url: Please add a valid redirect URL
error_template_you_are_looking_for_does_: Error! Template you are looking for doesn't existed
you_have_not_yet_created_any_template: You have not yet created any template
try_to_create_a_new_one_a_href_now: Try to create a new one now
this_template_does_not_exist_or_has_been: This template doesn't exist or has been deleted
also_save_this_notification_as_new_templ: Also save this notification as new template to use it later
schedule_to_send_your_notification_on: Schedule to send your notification on
you_must_set_the_scheduled_time_to_great: You must set the scheduled time to greater than the current time
template_with_this_name_already_exists: Template with this name already exists
provide_a_redirect_url_for_notification: Provide a redirect url for notification
there_are_no_notifications_here_yet: There are no notification here yet
create_your_first_notification_now_to_en: Create your first notification now to enjoy a great tool for announcing
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_not: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_selected: Are you sure you want to delete selected notification(s)?
are_you_sure_this_action_will_create_a_n: Are you sure? This action will create a new notification have same information with this notification then send it immediately.
send_now_failed_please_try_again: Send now failed, please try again!
notification_you_are_looking_for_does_no: Notification you are looking for doesn't exists or has been removed
are_you_sure_notification_will_be_sent_t: Are you sure? Notification will be sent to all subscribers in your site
to_learn_more_about_this_follow_the_link:
To learn more about this, follow the link below:
{link}
you_received_this_email_because_you_subs: You received this email because you subscribed for announcements from our website. If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may un-subscribe at any time.
edit_failed_you_can_edit_notification_wi: Edit failed! You can edit notification with status is "Scheduled" only.
